title: NFL preseason Week 3 takeaways and 53-man roster projections: Joe Milton III rebounds with two touchdowns
content: The final games of the 2025 preseason help flesh out key battles ahead of Tuesday's 53-man roster cuts.

title: Cowboys conclude preseason as Parsons looks on
content: Micah Parsons attended Friday night's preseason finale against Atlanta, the only player not to wear a jersey on the sidelines. He declined to answer questions after the game, but cornerback Trevon Diggs answered some on his behalf.

title: Johnson slams Bears' offense: 'Not good enough'
content: Bears coach Ben Johnson called out a "sloppy" first half in Friday's preseason win over the Chiefs that included a fumble and critical penalties, saying, "We got to get better in a hurry."

title: Kemp sentenced to home monitoring for shooting
content: Former NBA star Shawn Kemp was sentenced to 30 days of electronic home monitoring for shooting at two men inside a vehicle in a Washington state mall parking lot.

title: S.C. assistant in stable condition after car crash
content: South Carolina assistant coach Travian Robertson is hospitalized in stable condition after being involved in a car accident Friday in Chapin, South Carolina, the school said.

title: Bradley: Ryder Cup 'biggest decision' of my life
content: Keegan Bradley said Friday he has a "pretty good idea" who his six captain's picks will be for the Ryder Cup.

title: Falcons RT McGary may need IR stint, says Morris
content: Falcons coach Raheem Morris said RT Kaleb McGary will miss "significant time" because of an injury he suffered Wednesday in practice and could be a candidate for IR.

title: Jays' Bieber stellar in 1st start since April '24
content: Shane Bieber struck out nine over six dominant innings of one-run ball in his debut with the Blue Jays and first appearance in 16 months Friday night.

title: Top prospect Chandler debuts with 4-inning save
content: Pirates rookie Bubba Chandler, considered the top pitching prospect in baseball, became the first pitcher to throw four scoreless innings and record a save in his major league debut.

title: Tough draft-day decisions: Can you pick a top-5 QB and top-3 TE and like your team?
content: Daniel Dopp shares takeaways from more than 100 drafts to help you make tough decisions in your upcoming drafts.

title: Preseason report cards for every single rookie selected in the 2025 NFL draft
content: How did Hunter look in training camp? What's next for Shough? We checked in on all 32 teams' rookie classes.

title: Red Sox in must-win mode? Are Yankees back? What you should -- and shouldn't -- believe in the American League
content: How big is this series with New York for Boston? Is Toronto the best team in the AL? We give verdicts on what it all means.

title: How a swing tweak took Roman Anthony to the next level
content: The Red Sox rookie made his Yankee Stadium debut with a bang, but lately, he has been pummeling everybody.

title: Inside Arch Manning's wild recruitment saga
content: Getting the heir to football's QB dynasty to commit was destined to be crazy. But this was even beyond that.

title: 'We are what we drive': How car dealers became college football's power brokers
content: More college football players are driving sports cars than ever before. But the connection between dealers and programs goes back decades.

title: High school coach? Ayesha Curry opens up on spouse Stephen Curry's early career goal
content: Ayesha Curry, who is married to two-time NBA MVP Stephen Curry, revealed he wanted to be a high school basketball coach.

title: Russell Westbrook makes music video cameo with Ciara
content: The NBA free agent made a surprise cameo, showing off his moves alongside the Grammy Award-winning singer.

title: LeBron, KD and an unprecedented next chapter in their 20-year rivalry
content: For two decades, the two superstars have led superteams to NBA glory. Now, for the first time, they're both looking up at one -- and perhaps the best one yet.

title: Brian Robinson Jr. to the 49ers, Devaughn Vele to the Saints
content: Who won the 49ers-Commanders trade? Why did the Saints give up so much for a 27-year-old wide receiver? We sized up preseason NFL deals.

title: Which of the top-10 2025 recruits will play big roles? We have intel on each player
content: These formerly top-10 recruits are ready to start the season. Some will have bigger impacts than others.

title: Man United have a goalkeeper problem, but solving it might have to wait
content: Manchester United's loss to Arsenal in the opening weekend exposed their weakness between the sticks, but Ruben Amorim might be forced to press on with the players he has.

title: The best worst transfers: Why the likes of Sancho, Werner were actually smart signings
content: Sometimes, a transfer should work out, but doesn't. Here are the best worst transfers over the past decade in the Premier League and beyond.

title: 'Dak's gotta be able to run': How will Prescott's hamstring affect his usage in 2025?
content: A hamstring avulsion ended Prescott's 2024 season in Week 9, but he's been pushing it this offseason.

title: Reid's annual HBCU watch list: Ranking the top 10 prospects for the 2026 NFL draft
content: Ahead of Saturday's Cricket MEAC/SWAC Challenge Kickoff, we ranked 10 HBCU players who could be on next year's NFL draft radar.

title: Real or Not, WNBA playoff race edition: Who’s in, who’s out and which teams will host
content: Which teams might host? Could New York fall to the 4-seed? We examine the teams in the WNBA playoff hunt.

title: 2025 LLBWS success builds on Connecticut championship history
content: The 2025 LLBWS adds to Connecticut's championship appearances at the amateur level. Learn more about the state's collegiate titles now.

title: AFC West preview: Chargers and Broncos will surpass expectations
content: Will the Chargers or Broncos leapfrog the Chiefs? Raiders on the rise? Here are all the odds for each team in the AFC West and our favorite bets.

title: NFC West preview: 49ers and Rams top odds, but don't count out Seahawks and Cards
content: The NFC West projects to be a tight, four-team race. Here are the odds for each team and our favorite bets.

title: How mid-major coaches are embracing -- or resisting -- being high-major launchpads
content: Some mid-major coaches lean into pitching their programs as a development step. Others are reluctant.

title: PLL quarterfinals preview: Key stats, matchups, how to watch
content: Which teams will advance to take on the Atlas and Outlaws in the next round? Here's what you need to know.

title: NBA 2K26 reveals top 20 rated players
content: The best players in NBA 2K26 have been revealed. Has Nikola Jokic kept the top spot, or will Shai Gilgeous-Alexander displace him?

title: Complaint against woman for filming Instagram reels at Guruvayur Temple pond
content: The accused, identified as Jasmin Jaffar, reportedly shot videos on the temple’s sacred pond steps, where rituals like aarattu are held, and in the temple corridors, before posting them on Instagram

title: Tamil Nadu sees 9% drop in road accidents and fatalities this year
content: Director-General of Police Shankar Jiwal said the State has witnessed an overall reduction of road accidents and fatalities by 9% for the period from January to July this year, compared to the same period last year

title: Opposition parties react sharply to Jammu & Kashmir Government's takeover of JeI-linked schools
content: Peoples’ Conference chief and Handwara MLA Sajad Lone said, “Shame and shamelessness have assumed new meanings in this government”

title: Passengers escape as T.N. government bus hangs off bridge near Ponneri in Tiruvallur
content: While the bus was near Thathaimanji village, the driver lost control of the vehicle due to brake failure, and it crashed into the retaining wall of a bridge

title: Trinamool Congress says won’t appoint members to JPC on Bills to oust arrested PM, CMs
content: “We oppose the 130th Constitution Amendment Bill at the stage of introduction, and in our view the JPC is a farce. Therefore, we are not nominating anyone from AITC,” the party said in a statement

title: Congress hints at more stringent action against Rahul Mamkootathil
content: Mamkootathil’s resignation “first phase,“ says Satheesan; Shafi Parambil responds to accusations that he is shielding his close confidante

title: ‘Param Sundari’ row: When Bollywood went beyond ‘mullapoo’, Mohiniyattam and ‘laal colour ki sari’ to represent Malayalis
content: Jahnvi Kapoor’s Malayali character in ‘Param Sundari’, Thekkapetta Sundari Damodaran Pillai, is the latest addition to the list of misrepresented characters from Kerala

title: Two killed in rain-related incidents in Jammu & Kashmir’s Reasi, Kathua districts
content: “Shahbaz Ahmad lost his life and two others were injured when their truck came under a landslide triggered by rains near Malai Nallah in the Mahore area of Reasi district,” officials said

title: J&K Govt begins process of taking over 215 schools linked to banned Jamaat-e-Islami
content: The process follows after the School Education Department ordered the takeover of the schools affiliated with JeI and its Falah-e-Aam Trust

title: Thunderstorms trigger widespread downpour across Chennai and surrounding areas
content: The RMC has forecast light to moderate rain for Chennai, adjoining districts, Nagapattinam, and Ramanathapuram till Saturday afternoon

title: India extends airspace closure for Pakistan planes till September 24
content: Following the Pahalgam terror attack on April 22, India closed its airspace for planes operated, owned or leased by Pakistan airlines and operators, including military flights

title: How is Bengaluru planning to handle stray dogs?
content: The BBMP’s comprehensive plan to address the issue involves ABC, microchipping, and feeding programmes.

title: T.N. government to frame guidelines for child witnesses to gruesome crimes after Madras High Court’s intervention
content: Justices M.S. Ramesh and V. Lakshminarayanan were disturbed by a case involving an eight-year-old girl who had witnessed her mother’s body being dismembered by her uncle

title: Deep space exploration next, prepare for it: PM Modi tells scientists on National Space Day
content: In a video address on the National Space Day, Mr. Modi announced that India was preparing to set up a pool of astronauts for future missions and urged the youth to be part of this group

title: Andhra GoM to examine proposal to enhance retirement age of employees of PSUs, Corporations to 62
content: The GoM has been asked to submit its recommendations at an early date to enable the government to pursue the matter, as per the G.O issued by Chief Secretary K. Vijayanand

title: Uttarakhand flash floods LIVE: Army launches relief operations in rain-battered Chamoli district
content: Two missing after heavy rain floods Tharali town in Chamoli district; homes washed away and roads closed

title: Jammu & Kashmir Education Minister Sakina Itoo says original proposal never intended to take over JeI, FAT-linked schools
content: Sakina Itoo said the draft approved by her mentioned that the cluster principals would look after these schools, contrary to the order issued by the School Education Department Secretary

title: CBI books Anil Ambani's RCOM for ₹2,000-crore bank fraud, searches premises
content: SBI had earlier reported the loan account of the company as ‘fraud’ and reported the name of Anil Ambani to the RBI

title: Centre desperately found ways to disrupt session: Derek O'Brien
content: “The full Monsoon Session, the creaky 239 seat Modi coalition were on the defensive. Vice-President of India went missing & BJP still not found a new national President,” Trinamool Congress MP Derek O’Brien said

title: Former Bihar Deputy CM Tejashwi Yadav booked in Uttar Pradesh for calling PM Modi 'vote thief' in post
content: The FIR alleges that the post “created significant resentment among the general public and the BJP workers

title: Messi will come to Kerala, State Sports Minister makes yet another U-turn
content: Unlike previous announcements, which drew criticism when later retracted, this time the statement was accompanied confirmation from the Argentina Football Association (AFA)

title: Postal Department suspends bookings to the U.S. from August 25
content: Documents, gifts worth upto $100 will be exempted; Postal Department said it is closely following the situation and taking measures to restore services

title: Five killed, one missing as heavy rain wreaks havoc in Jharkhand
content: “A woman and her seven-year-old son died after their house collapsed in Seraikela-Kharsawan district on August 22, ” officials said

title: Chennai Corporation conservancy worker dies of electrocution in Kannagi Nagar TNUHDB complex
content: Kannagi Nagar residents have repeatedly complained about live electric cables posing a danger to the 11th Cross Street, but no action has been taken, according to Ward 196 councillor K. Ashwini Karuna

title: Suravaram Sudhakar Reddy: An orator par excellence who led student, youth and farmers’ struggles in the country
content: Known for his oratory skills, Suravaram Sudhakar Reddy worked extensively among agricultural workers and led struggles in Nalgonda, Medak, Mahbubnagar, and Kurnool districts

title: Markandey Katju apologises for ‘wink’ remark after outrage from women lawyers’ body
content: On Friday he was forced to apologise after drawing sharp criticism over a social media post suggesting that women lawyers who winked at him secured favourable judicial orders

title: Who gets to own the moon? India is uniquely positioned to answer
content: The shift from the moon as a shared heritage to the moon as a competitive arena raises concerns about whether we are entering a ‘first come, first serve’ era of lunar exploration

title: NDA’s V-P pick not aligned with our ideology; told CM Fadnavis can’t accept his support plea: Sharad Pawar
content: The Nationalist Congress Party (SP) rejects C.P. Radhakrishnan as V-P candidate and expresses support for the Opposition’s Sudarshan Reddy in the upcoming election

title: Sharmila slams YSRCP for supporting NDA’s Vice-Presidential candidate
content: It is doing so out of fear of corruption cases and to protect its wrongdoings, the APCC chief alleges

title: Flash floods in Chamoli, Uttarakhand: Heavy rains cause severe flood in Tharali town; two missing
content: The rain has rendered Karnaprayag-Gwaldam National Highway connecting Tharali shut due to debris near Ming Gadhera

title: ED arrests Mohali-based builder in ₹4,817-crore foreign remittance case
content: The accused has been identified as Rajdeep Sharma, a builder based in Punjab’s Mohali, who was produced before a Delhi special court that sent him to ED custody till August 28

title: RJD leader Tejashwi Yadav faces FIR in Maharashtra for ‘objectionable’ post on PM Modi
content: The official said BJP MLA from Maharashtra’s Gadchiroli, Milind Narote, alleged that RJD leader posted an objectionable comment against the Prime Minister on X ahead of his visit to Gaya, Bihar

title: Chandrababu Naidu condoles the death of Sudhakar Reddy
content: Naidu observed that Mr. Sudhakar Reddy rose through the ranks in the Communist Party of India and became its  National General Secretary

title: Back from the dead, Vizag waterbodies piece together a fragile ecology
content: Visakhapatnam Metropolitan Region Development Authority has embarked upon an ambitious project to revive waterbodies under its jurisdiction that had been lost owing to urbanisation and silt accumulation. A pilot, undertaken in a village 10 kilometres from the city, has already rejuvenated four lakes and their accompanying ecosystems

title: Assam Rifles demonstrates use of drones against terrorists; CM Manik Saha witnesses
content: Assam Rifles showcases drone technology for counter-insurgency operations in Agartala, praised by Tripura Chief Minister for maintaining peace

title: Real money gaming firms wind down operations
content: Most major platforms over August 21 and August 22 stopped offering cash games, in compliance with the Promotion and Regulation of Gaming Act, 2025, which was signed into law on August 22

title: Haryana teacher’s death: Uproar in House amid Congress demands for discussion on law and order
content: Mayhem in Haryana Legislative Assembly as Congress demands urgent discussion on law and order, leading to adjournments

title: 22 more externed from Dharwad district
content: Ahead of the Ganesh festival, the Hubballi-Dharwad Police Commissionerate has issued the orders as a precautionary measure

title: ‘If you don’t like it, don’t buy it’: Jaishankar slams sanctions on Russia oil
content: External affairs minister S Jaishankar staunchly defended India's energy ties with Russia, emphasising their role in stabilising global oil prices and serving national interests. He asserted India's right to autonomous decision-making, addressing criticism over Russian crude purchases by stating that Europe and America also engage in such transactions.

title: Dharmasthala case U-turn: Whistleblower who alleged multiple burials arrested
content: A former sanitation worker in Karnataka is now under arrest. He claimed he was forced to bury murder victims in Dharmasthala. The worker alleged this happened over several years. He filed a complaint and even provided skeletal remains. Police registered a case and are investigating the claims. The man also sought protection for himself and his family.

title: Mumbai rains: Animal shelter housing 91 strays floods; 2 dogs, 3 cats die
content: Devastating floods in Vasai's Naigaon, triggered by heavy rains and mangrove destruction, severely impacted Jeet Bhatti's animal shelter, claiming the lives of two dogs and three cats. Bhatti, with his uncle's help, rescued many animals, aided by the forest department and NGOs like Yoda and Furacause.

title: Lucknow: 2 minors raped by stepfather who was jailed for killing their biological dad
content: In Gomtinagar, Lucknow, two minor sisters, aged 12 and 14, bravely reported their stepfather to the police, accusing him of repeated rape over several months. The sisters managed to escape and contacted 1090, detailing the abuse and their mother's dismissal of their claims.

title: 'India in golden age of space': Shubhanshu Shukla on National Space Day
content: Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla highlighted India's thriving space exploration phase during National Space Day celebrations, emphasizing the excitement surrounding upcoming missions like Gaganyaan and lunar landings. He noted international interest from agencies in Japan and Europe eager to collaborate.

title: From ‘complete gibberish’ to goldmine: Oracle founder becomes 2nd richest; beats Bezos, Zuckerberg
content: Larry Ellison, once a cloud computing skeptic, has become the second-richest person globally as Oracle's cloud services boom. Fueled by AI demand, Oracle's cloud infrastructure is experiencing record growth, attracting major clients like OpenAI. With significant investments in data centers, Oracle anticipates substantial revenue growth in the coming years.

title: UP man walks into DM office with dead newborn in bag; pleads to revive baby
content: In Lakhimpur Kheri, a grieving father walked into the DM's office with his dead newborn, alleging that a private hospital's negligence caused the infant's death. Vipin Gupta claimed his wife, Rubi, received incorrect medication. The DM has pledged to cover Rubi's medical costs.

title: Virat Kohli ready for Australia series? Post-practice images from the UK viral
content: Virat Kohli's training images from London have sparked excitement among fans as he prepares for the upcoming ODI series in Australia. Spotted at Lord's Cricket Ground, Kohli balanced practice with leisure, spending time with wife Anushka Sharma. Despite discussions about farewell matches, BCCI clarifies that Kohli and Rohit Sharma continue to be vital players in the ODI format.

title: Bank fraud case: FIR registered against Anil Ambani; CBI raids premises linked to RCOM
content: The CBI raided premises linked to Reliance Communications and Anil Ambani concerning a suspected large-scale bank fraud, following an FIR registration. This action follows the ED's questioning of Ambani regarding a money laundering probe involving over Rs 17,000 crore in bank loan frauds.

title: Foxconn shift: No longer Apple’s iPhone factory floor; now building this AI technology
content: Foxconn, known for iPhone production, is changing its business. The company is now focusing on artificial intelligence. It is building AI servers for cloud computing and generative AI. Demand for AI infrastructure is increasing. Foxconn is partnering with Nvidia, Supermicro, and Dell. This move positions Foxconn as a key player in enterprise hardware.

title: 'We reached Moon and Mars': PM Modi marks National Space Day
content: Prime Minister Modi addressed the nation on National Space Day, celebrating India's space achievements and the accomplishments of its scientists and astronauts. He emphasized India's rapid progress in space technology, including the development of semi-cryogenic engines.

title: 'Caught stealing bat': 14-year-old kills girl in Hyderabad
content: In Hyderabad, a shocking incident unfolded as a 14-year-old boy was apprehended for allegedly murdering a 10-year-old girl. Police suspect the motive stemmed from the girl catching him attempting to steal a cricket bat from her residence.

title: 'Spoiled brat': Rijiju's veiled attack at Rahul over 'vote chori' charge
content: Union Minister Kiren Rijiju criticized Rahul Gandhi's "vote chori" charge, referencing a CSDS psephologist's apology for a data mishap. Rijiju questioned Gandhi's credibility, accusing him of public lies and demanding an apology. Gandhi escalated his accusations against the BJP, alleging vote theft and accusing the Election Commission of complicity in undermining citizens' voting rights during a rally in Bhagalpur.

title: Elon Musk teen prodigy quits after 2 years: Tech CEO respond; says ‘Never heard of him’
content: Elon Musk claims ignorance of Kairan Quazi's SpaceX departure, despite the 16-year-old prodigy's two-year tenure at the company. Quazi, who joined SpaceX at 14, is transitioning to Citadel Securities, citing a desire for faster-paced challenges in quantitative finance. He previously criticized LinkedIn for age-based restrictions, highlighting biases in opportunity gatekeeping.

title: 'She liked my photos': Rinku Singh shares how he met Priya Saroj
content: Indian cricketer Rinku Singh and politician Priya Saroj surprised fans with their engagement news. Rinku revealed they connected in 2022 after he saw Priya's photo on a fan page and gathered the courage to message her. While their wedding is postponed due to Rinku's cricket commitments, he also expressed pride in Priya's political achievements.

title: BJP files complaint against Tejashwi Yadav over 'objectionable' post on PM Modi
content: An FIR has been registered against RJD leader and former Bihar Deputy Chief Minister Tejashwi Yadav in Maharashtra's Gadchiroli over an alleged objectionable post and defamatory content against Prime Minister Narendra Modi on the social media platform X.

title: 10 killed, 3 injured after auto-rickshaw collides with truck in Bihar
content: A tragic collision between an auto-rickshaw and a Hyva truck on the Daniyawan-Hilsa road in Patna district resulted in the death of 10 people, with three others injured. The accident, which occurred early Saturday morning, claimed the lives of nine women and the auto driver, all residents of Renri Marwa village.

title: Record breaker! 46-year-old Tahir adds to his numerous milestones
content: Imran Tahir led Guyana Amazon Warriors to a big win. He took five wickets against Antigua and Barbuda Falcons. Tahir became the oldest captain to achieve this feat in T20 cricket. He is now among the top wicket-takers in T20 history. The Warriors scored 211 runs, securing an 84-run victory. Tahir's bowling was key to the team's success.

title: Jharkhand battles monsoon mayhem: 5 dead, 1 missing
content: Heavy rainfall in Jharkhand has resulted in multiple fatalities and injuries across several districts. Roof and wall collapses claimed lives in Seraikela-Kharsawan, while a couple was swept away by a swollen river in Chatra. The IMD has issued warnings for continued heavy rainfall, thunderstorms, and gusty winds, leading to waterlogging and unsanitary conditions in Ranchi, disrupting daily life.

title: Odisha school shocker: Class 2 girl trapped, stuck in grill; headmaster suspended
content: A seven-year-old girl, Jyotsna Dehuri, was accidentally locked inside her classroom at Anjar Upper Primary School in Keonjhar district after falling asleep. She was found the next morning with her head stuck in a window grill. Following the incident, which sparked local tension, Headmaster Goura Charan Mohanta was suspended for alleged negligence after an inquiry by education officials.

title: Messi in India! Argentina confirm visit to Kerala: All you need to know
content: Football fans in Kerala are in for a treat! Argentina, led by Lionel Messi, will play a friendly match in Kochi between November 10 and 18, 2025. Sports Minister V Abdurahiman confirmed the exciting news, following discussions with Argentine Football Association officials. This will be Argentina's second visit to India, having previously played in Kolkata in 2011.

title: 'Illegal' in India, jailed in Bangladesh: 'Nowhere woman' prays for miracle
content: Sunali Khatun, an Indian resident, was pushed into Bangladesh and subsequently jailed as an illegal immigrant, despite possessing Indian identity documents. Along with her family and others, she was arrested in Delhi and deported, highlighting the plight of Bengali-speaking migrants facing deportation.

title: Intel stake deal: Trump secures 10% US ownership
content: The US government has acquired a 10% stake in Intel for $8.9 billion, funded through CHIPS Act grants and the Secure Enclave program. This move, celebrated by Intel's CEO, aims to bolster American technology and manufacturing.

title: Maharashtra: Tension erupts in Kolhapur after clash between two communities
content: A violent clash between two communities erupted in Kolhapur city's Siddharthnagar area, leading to arson and vandalism. Authorities deployed over 200 police personnel to control the tense situation near CPR Hospital. While the situation is now peaceful, police urged the public to disregard rumors and maintain calm, with community leaders appealing for peace.

title: LPG tanker collides with pickup truck in Punjab: 2 dead; 20 severely burnt
content: The accident likely occurred when a car collided with the tanker, resulting in a fire and subsequent explosion. Deputy Commissioner Aashika Jain stated that the fire tenders, ambulances, and Punjab Police were quickly deployed to the scene.

title: Russell Westbrook lights up the floor: NBA star features in Ciara’s latest video
content: Russell Westbrook's appearance in Ciara's "Dance With Me" music video has ignited excitement among NBA fans. The duo showcased their impressive dance moves in front of Randy's Doughnuts in Inglewood, California. Ciara expressed her gratitude to the NBA star on Instagram, acknowledging his rockstar energy and support for her new album, "CiCi."

title: Cloudburst in U'khand: Houses, vehicles under debris; woman trapped, man missing
content: A cloudburst in Chamoli, Uttarakhand, triggered debris flows that damaged homes, trapping a woman. The IMD has issued an orange alert for intense rainfall and thunderstorms across several districts. Landslides have blocked key roads in Pithoragarh, and rescue teams are addressing a blocked Yamuna River causing flooding in Barkot tehsil.

title: Two RJD MLAs expelled after sharing stage with PM Modi in Gaya
content: A political controversy erupted in Bihar after two RJD legislators, Vibha Devi and Prakash Veer, were seen at PM Modi's rally in Gaya, causing embarrassment for the RJD leadership amidst Tejashwi Yadav's 'Voter Adhikar Yatra'. Their presence suggests internal discord, especially after both rebelled against the party's Lok Sabha candidate.

title: Legends return! Kasparov teases Anand: 'I should give him a chance'
content: Chess legends Viswanathan Anand and Garry Kasparov are set to reignite their historic rivalry in St. Louis this October, headlining the Clutch Chess series. Adding to the excitement, current world champion D Gukesh will face off against Magnus Carlsen. Kasparov, while acknowledging Gukesh's title win, suggests Carlsen remains the strongest player, sparking debate about the current world championship landscape.

title: SIR row: Amartya Sen says it risks 'disenfranchising' poor people
content: Amartya Sen voiced concerns that Bihar's electoral roll revision could disenfranchise the poor due to strict documentation requirements. The Supreme Court questioned the lack of political party involvement in correcting voter deletions during the revision. The court allowed online claim submissions with Aadhaar or other documents, seeking status reports from political parties by September 8.

title: ‘He lay untreated for 30 mins’: What probe revealed in Class 10 student stabbing case
content: Ahmedabad police are investigating the tragic death of Nayan Santani, a student stabbed after a school fight. Shockingly, authorities allegedly prioritized cleaning bloodstains over providing immediate medical assistance. A criminal negligence complaint has been filed against the principal and teachers of Seventh Day Adventist School.

title: Chess | 'It wasn't Gukesh's fault that ... ': Polgar after Kasparov's jab
content: Garry Kasparov ignited controversy by suggesting Gukesh's world title lacks the prestige of past champions, despite Gukesh winning fairly. He implied Magnus Carlsen's era redefined the title's significance, prompting strong defence from Susan Polgar, who highlighted Gukesh's Candidates Tournament victory and criticised double standards. Gukesh continues to face intense scrutiny as he competes in the Sinquefield Cup.

title: Is Govinda divorcing wife Sunita Ahuja? Close family friend sets rumours to rest
content: Amidst swirling rumors of divorce fueled by allegations of cruelty and adultery, sources close to Govinda and Sunita Ahuja dismiss the claims. Despite 38 years of marriage marked by occasional violent fights leading to temporary separations, insiders insist Govinda relies heavily on Sunita's stability and influence, suggesting they will ultimately reconcile, even if legal proceedings have commenced.

title: Kolkata: Elderly woman killed, husband found tied up; ornaments missing
content: In Kolkata, a tragic incident occurred at the New Garia Cooperative Society where a 79-year-old woman, Bijaya Das, was found murdered in her bungalow, with her husband, Prasanta, 83, discovered tied up. The crime scene indicated forced entry and severed electrical wires, suggesting a planned attack.

title: Class 11 boy issues bomb threat in Uttarakhand school to force holiday; detained
content: A Class 11 student in Bazpur was detained after posting a fake bomb threat on his school's website, aiming to cancel exams he was unprepared for. The threat triggered a police investigation, including a bomb disposal squad search, causing widespread panic among parents.

title: Driver distracted? New York City tour bus crash kills five – Indians among passengers
content: A tour bus accident on Interstate 90 near Pembroke, New York, resulted in five fatalities and numerous injuries. The bus, carrying 54 people from Niagara Falls to New York City, overturned when the driver became distracted and lost control. Most passengers were of Indian, Chinese, and Filipino descent. Investigations are ongoing, with distraction identified as the likely cause.

title: Trump targets imported furniture: Tariffs likely in 50 days; market reacts sharply
content: Donald Trump announced a major investigation into imported furniture, potentially leading to new tariffs. This move aims to revitalise furniture businesses in states like North and South Carolina, and Michigan. Following the announcement, stocks of retailers like Wayfair and Williams-Sonoma, heavily reliant on imports, declined. Conversely, La-Z-Boy, a US-based manufacturer, saw its stock rise.

title: ‘Massive sanctions or tariffs’: Trump’s big warning on Russia-Ukraine war
content: Donald Trump gives Russia and Ukraine a two-week deadline. He will decide on imposing sanctions or tariffs. A Russia-Ukraine summit faces challenges. Sergei Lavrov confirms no meeting is planned. Volodymyr Zelensky accuses Moscow of avoiding talks. Trump suggests inviting Vladimir Putin to the 2026 FIFA World Cup. Security guarantees for Ukraine remain unresolved.

title: 'Light at the end of the tunnel': Putin expresses hope of mending US ties
content: Amid strained relations, Vladimir Putin expressed optimism about US ties under Donald Trump, hinting at potential Arctic cooperation. Trump, however, seemed uncertain about the Russia-Ukraine war's resolution, despite earlier claims of a quick fix. He threatened further action, including sanctions, if direct talks between Putin and Zelenskyy failed. Discussions regarding collaboration in the Arctic and Alaska are reportedly underway.

title: IPL: RCB finally reveals why they let go of Mohammed Siraj – Here’s the reason
content: Royal Challengers Bengaluru clinched their first IPL title in 2025, marking a new era after a mega auction. Strategic signings like Josh Hazlewood and Bhuvneshwar Kumar bolstered their squad, leading to Mohammed Siraj's departure. Director Mo Bobat highlighted the tough decision to release Siraj, prioritizing Bhuvneshwar's versatility.

title: What is the Wayne Gretzky Rule and how it changed the modern NHL forever
content: Wayne Gretzky's influence extends beyond his playing days. A major rule change after the 2005 NHL lockout, known as the Wayne Gretzky Rule, transformed the game. It emphasized speed and skill over obstruction. Referees started calling penalties more aggressively. This created more space for offense. The rule change led to a more dynamic and exciting era of NHL hockey.

title: This simple neck test could predict your risk of heart disease, even an early death
content: Recent research indicates that neck circumference is a simple yet powerful indicator of metabolic and cardiovascular health risks. Studies reveal a link between a thicker neck and conditions like heart disease, sleep apnea, and metabolic syndrome. Measuring your neck at home can help identify potential health issues early, prompting timely medical check-ups.

title: India to develop with France engine for desi stealth fighter
content: "DRDO has cleared the proposal by Safran, which already makes a variety of helicopter engines in India, as the best option for the twin-engine fifth-generation fighter called AMCA (advanced medium combat aircraft). The project, with DRDO's lab Gas Turbine Research Establishment, would cost almost $7 billion," an official said.

title: Gukesh under fire! Chess legend Kasparov: 'Hardly call him the strongest'
content: Garry Kasparov commented on Gukesh's recent world championship win during the Sinquefield Cup. Kasparov acknowledged Gukesh's victory but questioned his status as the strongest player. He contrasted Gukesh's title with those of past champions like Magnus Carlsen. Kasparov later apologised while standing by his opinion. He highlighted the excitement for future Candidates and world championship matches.

title: Stuck in Mumbai traffic! Rohit Sharma’s reaction to fan on camera goes viral - Watch
content: Amidst Mumbai's traffic, Rohit Sharma's humble gesture towards fans went viral, showcasing his down-to-earth nature. BCCI vice president Rajeev Shukla addressed speculations about farewell matches for Sharma and Virat Kohli, clarifying that retirement decisions rest solely with the players. Both stars, now focused on ODIs, will next play in Australia this October.

title: India's Big Leap: Home-Built Engines For 'Made In India' 5th-Gen Stealth Jets
content: India will indigenously build its fifth-generation fighter aircraft and aircraft engines, Defence Minister Rajnath Singh has announced, reflecting the country's resolve to become self-reliant in the Defence sector.

title: Congress Backs Rahul Mamkootathil, Rejects Calls For Resignation From Assembly
content: The Congress party on Saturday strongly backed first-time MLA Rahul Mamkootathil, rejecting demands from the CPI(M) and BJP for his resignation from the Assembly following allegations of misbehavior.

title: Government Employee Opens Wedding Invite On WhatsApp, Loses Rs 1,90,000
content: A seemingly innocent digital wedding invitation on WhatsApp cost a government employee from Maharashtra's Hingoli district to lose nearly Rs two lakhs.

title: Ranchi Woman, Lover Used Alcohol, Sleeping Pills To Kill Husband, Arrested
content: Ranchi police have arrested a woman and her partner on charges of killing her husband, police officials said. Geeta Devi and Irfan Ansari were arrested on charges of killing Geeta's husband.

title: CBI Raids Premises Linked To Anil Ambani In Rs 2,000 Crore Bank Fraud Case: Sources
content: The searches were conducted at linked to Reliance Communications and its Promoter Director, Anil Ambani, in Mumbai.

title: Baby Dies At Hospital, Father Reaches Government Office With Body In Bag
content: The District Magistrate in Uttar Pradesh's Lakhimpur Kheri sealed a hospital after a man reached the DM office with the body of his newborn child, who died during delivery.

title: Big Twist In Dharmasthala Case, 'Mass Burial' Complainant Arrested
content: In a big twist in the Dharmasthala "mass burial" case, the complainant who had alleged mass rapes and murders had taken place in the holy town has been taken into custody by the Special Investigation Team.

title: "Trump Was Never Inappropriate With Anyone": Epstein's Aide Ghislaine Maxwell
content: In the hundreds of pages of transcripts from Justice Department interviews of Ghislaine Maxwell, the former girlfriend of disgraced financier Jeffrey Epstein spoke glowingly of President Donald Trump.

title: Stranded On Norwegian Glacier, US Hiker Drinks His Urine To Stay Alive
content: Alec Luhm set out in July for a four-day hike through the glaciers of Norway's Folgefonna National Park.

title: Cloudburst Hits Uttarakhand's Chamoli District, Several Feared Missing
content: Many people are feared missing after a cloudburst in Uttarakhand's Chamoli district on Friday night caused debris to sweep through homes.

title: Maharashtra Doctor Falls On Road As Bike Hits Pothole, Run Over By Truck
content: A doctor lost his life after his two-wheeler slipped on a pothole-filled road in Maharashtra. The incident has sparked outrage against poor road conditions.

title: LPG Tanker Explosion In Punjab Kills Two, Injures Others
content: Two people were killed after the LPG tanker and a pickup truck collision resulted in a massive explosion and fire in Punjab's Mandiala village in the Hoshiarpur district, an official confirmed on Saturday.

title: Why Elon Musk Once Called Sergio Gor, Trump's India Envoy Pick, A "Snake"
content: Sergio Gor, Donald Trump's India ambassador pick, was once called a "snake" by the US President's former confidante, Elon Musk.

title: After Brother Erik, Lyle Menendez Denied Parole In Parents' Murder
content: A US judicial commission denied parole Friday to Joseph Lyle Menendez, a day after his brother Erik was also ordered to stay in prison for the murder of their parents in a Beverly Hills mansion more than three decades ago.

title: How Abhishek Banerjee's Elevation Is Helping Trinamool In Parliament
content: The decision by Mamata Banerjee to appoint her nephew Abhishek Banerjee as Trinamool Congress's Parliamentary Party leader in the Lok Sabha seems to have  helped boost the party's presence in Parliament.

title: On Camera, 7 Stray Dogs Attack Maharashtra Man. Then A Dramatic Escape
content: The nearly three-minute clip shows the man walking in a dark alley when seven stray dogs came running towards him and attacked him.

title: "Too Much Ordering, Pressuring": Ex-US Diplomat Snubs Trump Over India Ties
content: The concern over US President Donald Trump alienating allies like India has been echoed by former Secretary of State John Kerry.

title: Apple Files Lawsuit Against Oppo For Poaching, Stealing Trade Secrets
content: Apple Inc. accused smartphone maker Oppo in a lawsuit of poaching a highly paid member of the Apple Watch team and encouraging him to steal trade secrets for his new job with the Chinese firm.

title: FIR Filed Against Tejashwi Yadav In Maharashtra Over Post On PM Modi
content: Police in Maharashtra's Gadchiroli district have registered a case against former Bihar deputy chief minister Tejashwi Yadav for tweeting an alleged objectionable post about Prime Minister Narendra Modi.

title: Woman’s body found in waste pit
content: The discovery followed a complaint of attempted theft on the property by its owner. The house has remained closed for long

title: HMDA to distribute one lakh clay Ganesh idols at 34 locations
content: This year, the HMDA is making arrangements to distribute one lakh clay Ganesh idols, eight inches in height, at 34 locations, for an eco-friendly  Ganesh Chathurthi

title: Siddaramaiah taunts JD(S) on its ‘dwindling strength’
content: Mr. Siddaramaiah described his first stint as Chief Minister from 2013 to 2018 as the “golden period” for the State owing to availability of adequate funds

title: Karnataka has released more than year’s share of Cauvery to Tamil Nadu, says CM
content: Siddaramaiah appealed to Tamil Nadu to drop its objection to the Mekedatu project as it would not harm its interests

title: Political parties compete to take credit for Kolkata metro line expansion
content: Trinamool, BJP, and CPI(M) speak about their individual contributions to the Kolkata metropolitan metro line expansion and connectivity

title: Assam village chiefs made stakeholders in vulture conservation
content: A gram pradhan said incidents of poisoning the scavenging birds were outcomes of attempts by people to fight cattle predation by wild carnivores and feral dogs

title: ‘Link in bio’ site Linktree unblocked, paid Indian users to receive extension, firm says
content: The largest ‘link in bio’ service Linktree, which helps Instagram users aggregate URLs they can’t include in posts on a single page, has been unblocked, days after The Hindu reported on its blocking.

title: Sergio Gor, Donald Trump’s close political aide, named next U.S. ambassador to India
content: Mr. Gor, who is currently the director of the White House Presidential Personnel Office, will remain in that position until his confirmation, Mr. Trump said

title: Indians in Ireland: Building a home amid the hostility
content: On July 19, 2025, an Indian man was assaulted in the suburb of Tallaght in Dublin, Ireland. Since then, there have been several attacks against Indians in the green isle, causing alarm in the immigrant community. With politicians there riding on anti-immigrant rhetoric, the situation has worsened. Priyanka Borpujari reports on how the transformation of Ireland as a major immigrant destination has brought many challenges

title: Farmers in distress as fertilisers in short supply in U.P.: Cong.
content: State Congress president accuses govt. of ‘remaining a mute spectator’ and failing to address the acute shortage

title: Coimbatore Unlimited 3.0 | Tamil Nadu has huge potential for development of integrated townships, say panellists
content: While investors look at tier-one cities to fund development of integrated townships, the scope is more in tier-two cities as land is available in the suburban areas, they say

title: West Bengal Joint Entrance Examinations results declared after three-month delay
content: The results follow an unprecedented delay owing to legal complications surrounding the revisions in the list of Other Backward Classes (OBC)

title: Karnataka’s financial burden due to indiscipline spend of erstwhile BJP govt and cut in Central funding and not guarantees: CM
content: He describes guarantee schemes as development schemes that have helped increase the State’s per capita income

title: Ladakh administration revokes allotment of land for Sonam Wangchuk’s institute
content: Mr. Wangchuk has led the protests in Ladakh for three years; an order said the land has not been used for the purpose allotted “as no University (as recognised by law) has been set up” till date

title: Withdraw FIR against Abhisar Sharma: Press Club
content: The PCI accused the Assam Police of turning “a blind eye in not taking cognisance of what the apex court has directed in a similar case pertaining to The Wire editors”

title: Caste census: In a first, panel to use domestic electricity connection to draw up list of households in Karnataka
content: The earlier surveys, including that of SCs for internal quota, have relied on census data and voter list

title: Mumbai hosts youth-led climate consultation as India prepares for COP30 in Brazil
content: Participants aged 13-25 in Mumbai pledge action and to co-create solutions to contribute to India’s National Youth Statement

title: Karnataka HC finds no fault in compulsorily retiring civil judge for threatening police inspector
content: We find no infirmity with either the procedure adopted nor find that the punishment imposed is highly disproportionate, the bench observed in its order

title: West Bengal being a border State faces threat of infiltration, says Modi
content: Infiltrators changing State’s demography, putting pressure on resources and posing a threat to women’s safety, but Trinamool and Congress are supporting them for appeasement politics, says PM

title: India-China border trade through Lipu Lekh ‘unexpected and unacceptable’ to Nepal, says former Nepali Foreign Minister
content: Nepal to send diplomatic note, claims the Kalapani-Lipu Lekh-Limpiyadhura region as its sovereign territory; such claims not justified, says MEA; plans for Nepali PM to visit India still on track

title: Watch: Parai: The soulful beat of Chennai’s streets | Madras Day
content: The Parai is one of the oldest percussion instruments of Tamil culture, once used in rituals and now a powerful symbol of resistance, identity, and celebration. In this Madras Day special, we explore the story of the Parai, its cultural roots, and why its sound continues to inspire across generations.

title: Kunamneni elected as CPI state secretary again at the 4th State Conference
content: A total of 727 delegates from across Telangana participated. CPI State secretary Kunamneni Sambasiva Rao presented the political and organisational report

title: Left behind, eight-year-old Odisha girl spends night stuck in school window
content: Teachers and students had hurriedly locked the classrooms and left the premises—unaware the girl was still inside, fast asleep.

title: Modi government has closed all paths of employment for youth, says Rahul Gandhi
content: The Congress leader, while addressing a public meeting in Kahalgaon during the Voter Adhikar Yatra, says the names of people voting for the Opposition are being removed in SIR; Tejashwi Yadav asserts the people of Bihar will teach lessons to Chief Minister Nitish Kumar

title: 40% of Chief Ministers face criminal cases: ADR
content: The poll rights body’s report comes even as the Centre has introduced three bills that seek the removal of Prime Minister, Chief Ministers, and Ministers arrested for 30 days on serious criminal charges

content: Chennai isn’t just a city—it’s a star on the silver screen! From Marina Beach to Napier Bridge, we take you through the city’s most iconic spots that have appeared in popular films. Watch how Chennai’s landmarks became cinematic backdrops for unforgettable movie moments.
